response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds immense value for us and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I propose a purchase price of $950,000 for this product. We understand that its true worth might be subjective, but we are confident that this price reflects its exceptional quality and potential benefits.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. We are here to ensure that you make an informed decision.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
